files.patch:
@@ -276,0 +276,7 @@
+				<configuration>
+					<!-- Prevent gpg from using pinentry programs -->
+					<gpgArguments>
+						<arg>--pinentry-mode</arg>
+						<arg>loopback</arg>
+					</gpgArguments>
+				</configuration>

@@ -277,0 +277,7 @@
+				<configuration>
+					<!-- Prevent gpg from using pinentry programs -->
+					<gpgArguments>
+						<arg>--pinentry-mode</arg>
+						<arg>loopback</arg>
+					</gpgArguments>
+				</configuration>
